data.text: @DrJacobsRad Your opinion on this would be appreciated. https://t.co/loUOAqK8aS

@ccleighton @DrJacobsRad @KashPrime They are but the system they use for calculating them usually results in you only getting 1/3-1/2 of your actual costs back.   This might be a situation for full indemnity costs though.

Everything in litigation, even a summary proceeding like this, is just to flippin' expensive.

@DrJacobsRad And just like that he can't handle a different opinion that I politely expressed to him so he blocked me. The TV docs like this guy who stoked the irrational fear the entire pandemic just can't admit that they were factually wrong about a lot of things, mainly that NPIs did squat
@DrJacobsRad Happy to make the time whenever…better weather? And once you finally get a reprieve from ur 2nd job as Ontario Covid guru?!? 🥳
@DrJacobsRad Sorry you had to endure this amigo ✊🏽
@DrJacobsRad Congratulations and thank you for fighting for us.

@DrJacobsRad You are passing this off as a victory against so called "COVID misinformation". That is incorrect. The judge clearly stated that he wasn't ruling on that. He ruled that your statements were made on matters of public interest. Honesty matters.

@DrJacobsRad @TrueNorthNews I don’t know about this Doc. Seems like alot of the information which “aligned with public health & the government” turned out to be untrue & didn’t appear to prevent infection, prevent transmission or decrease severe illness or hospitalizations as per their own data.
